title: Five-Star South Africa KwaZulu-Natal Luxury Safari Lodge within 16,500-Hectare Private Game Park
description:
Experience the thrill of the wild with a five-star stay at this collection of luxury suites and residents, nestled in the heart of South Africa's Zululand. Jumeirah Thanda Safari is perfectly positioned within a 16,500-hectare private game reserve, offering guests an unparalleled opportunity to witness the majestic Big Five in their natural habitat.

When not on safari, retreat to your indulgent accomodation, with residences including a private chef and butler, plus facilities like private swimming pools and firepits.  End each day with a nightcap from the lodge's extensive wine cellar, featuring some of South Africa's finest vintages.
offer_address: D242 Road, KwaZulu Natal, 03960, South Africa
